name: Swanky Professions: Kids Games
description:
A new fun application “Swanky Professions” appeared in our collection of kids games!
More than 40 puzzle-cards with different professions enable little boys and girls to learn something new about professions and substantively enlarge their vocabulary. As other puzzle games it can also upgrade preschooler’s logic, attentiveness and assiduity.
The game is suitable for kids aged two and older.
Game features:
- Professional voice pronouncing by native speakers;
- You can select English or Russian voice pronouncing;
- The first level is 24 puzzle-cards with different professions. One card is one profession with associated objects;
- The second level is 21 puzzle-cards with athletes of various disciplines.
Voice pronouncing of a word appear after tapping a puzzle element. A short explanation of the essence of work appear after tapping a human shape. So the child could hear and learn some new words and notions. The multicolored balloons arise in case of successful card’s completeness witch are so attractive to pop!
The game could also be useful for kids who learn English or Russian as a foreign language.
The child will be fascinated by the bright colorful pictures with large-sized elements. The pleasant melodies accompany the game process with an option to switch them off.
You can also download other our baby games by tapping the icon inside the game.
